item.title: Css Z Index.md
item.description: notes: z-index need to add position relative or above z-index calculate from its parent that with z-index z-index auto do not measure edge case 1: layer 1 (z-index: 2), layer 1-1 (z-index: 99) layer 2 (z-index: 1), layer 2-1 (z-index: 99999) result: layer 1-1 shows on top edge case 2: layer 1 (z-index: 2), layer 1-1 (z-index: 99) layer 2 (z-index: auto), layer 2-1 (z-index: 99999) result: layer 2-1 shows on top test index.
